member.summary: Asynchronous version if you prefer async I/O.

member.name: M:ZagAPIServer.DB.DSZAG.BankIntegrationTransaction1.Fill(System.String)
member.summary: Retrieves a non-rejected bank integration transaction by TransactionID. Returns an empty DataTable if not found.

member.name: M:ZagAPIServer.DB.DSZAG.BankIntegrationTransaction1.UpdateQuery(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Updates BankReferenceNo and timestamp for a transaction. Returns the number of affected rows.

member.name: M:ZagAPIServer.DB.DSZAG.BankIntegrationTransaction1.UpdateRejection(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Marks a transaction as rejected with a note and updates timestamp. Returns the number of affected rows.

member.summary: Returns the cached ResourceManager instance used by this class.

member.name: P:ZagAPIServer.Properties.Resource1.Culture
member.summary: Overrides the current thread's CurrentUICulture property for all resource lookups using this strongly typed resource class.

member.name: M:ZagAPIServer.Tools.Tool.Nvl(System.Object,System.DateTime,System.String)
member.summary: Converts a string to a DateTime object with the specified format.
member.param: The object that calls the function.
The desired format of the DateTime object.
The value to return if the conversion fails.
member.returns: A formatted DateTime object representation of the string.

member.name: M:ZagAPIServer.Tools.Tool.Nvl(System.Object,System.Nullable{System.DateTime},System.String)
member.summary: Converts a string to a nullable DateTime object with the specified format.
member.param: The object that calls the function.
The desired format of the DateTime object.
The value to return if the conversion fails.
member.returns: A formatted nullable DateTime object representation of the string.
